alert.note: Alert for Carter (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 4:13PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Carter County through 445 PM MDT... At 413 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles west of Alzada, or 41 miles north of Sundance, moving northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Carter County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for southeastern Montana.
